CmsTool
@ToolUi.IconName(value="object-tool")
public abstract class Tool
extends com.psddev.dari.db.Application

Brightspot application, typically used by the internal staff.

fullUrl

public String fullUrl(String path,
                      Object... parameters)
Returns the full URL to the given path with the given parameters.

Parameters:
path - Can't be null.
parameters - May be null.
Returns:
Never null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If the given path is null, getApplicationName() returns null, or CmsTool.getDefaultToolUrl() returns blank.
